titleInfo.title: Hank Williams Jr. & Montgomery Gentry at the Starwood Amphitheatre

mods.abstract: Two color window card (yellow and blue on white) announcing Hank Williams Jr and Montgomery Gentry at the Starwood Amphitheatre on September 2. Poster features a woodcut of birds. The Starwood Amphitheatre was an outdoor music venue in Nashville, Tennessee from 1986 to 2006.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
